page.title: 07HOUSING ON PARKWOOD
page.content: There are many different types of house on Parkwood Estate. Some have been built recently, but others are about 20 years old. Many people own their own houses but some rent them. Lately there has been a great deal of building going on behind our school. Most of these new houses are semi- detached or detached and people have already moved in. There are not many blocks of flats on Parkwood, but most people who own shops usually live above them. My house is semi-detached and across the road from us there are detached houses. In Sandringham Road the houses are about five years old. The condition of the houses isn't too bad, but in some cases the woodwork is not very well finished.
